about_the_game:
We get to take on the role of a college student named Stewart. And we will have to go on an adventure in his nightmare to find the god of dreams.
It's about Action2D Roguelike, hack & slash,2DSidescrolling game which will take the player to meet various monsters. And there are 3 maps difference, where the checkpoints in each area will switch every time to avoid monotony. The players will Get new experiences and enjoy the game.

Main feature
Single player - The game must be played by one player. for players to absorb the atmosphere and fun
Battle - Battle with individual enemies in each stage or bosses and mini-bosses.
Passive skill - Choose to use Passive or Skill that will be gained by defeating each level or boss and mini boss which will come in random 3 pieces.
Hardcore - Dead players will start a new game.

name: ADVENGER OF STUART

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Window 7 or above (64-bit Operation System)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750ti or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Players will take on the role of a young man named Stuart. A college student meets a gorgeous fairy that will lead the player to conquer his dream to end this loop. We must defeat all the visitors and the enemies that come into his nightmare before they kill him.
